column5: I found 2 great places for dinners in picton this season if any one wants names ill post them. We could also do a big group dinner thing sat night.

It sounds like my plans are falling into place too, with Memart accepting gas money for the boat and  Mike the Pike and GlenK steeling themselves with free earplugs and a share in the rent.  Fishhunter, being a local, is the best choice for a group dinner on Saturday.  I like that idea.  We could leave the reservation until Friday when we have a better count.

It would be cool to over run a local restaurant with OFC'ers, but speaking from experience at these GTG's, my guess would be that some of the folks coming, may be too drive to drunk. Better left at the cottage! HH

lol you may be right but for those of us that go to have fun and fish with out getting drunk it would still be nice. A good place to go is on the main st. its called Gus's http://www.restaurantica.com/on/picton/gus...urant/23012980/

Gus's was good the last time I went there, just be sure to STAY AWAY from that "Family Restaurant" next to or near McDonalds... can you say cook, re-heat and repeat! Oh and by the way Lloyd, drunks are people to, ya know! LMAO HH
I WOULD NEVER TREAT YOU ANY LESS THEN PEOPLE MY FRIEND LOL
WHEW! Thanks, that gets me off the hook too!
You have a PM my friend...
lol
bump.  Seven more sleeps.
Eight for me.....
one for me....
You are such a teeze Lloyd.I won't sleep for the next 7 nights.
Ill be on the water the 7 of the next 9 days
So where is the main G2G Sat night, I have a trophy that needs to be given to the biggest weight class walleye.
For those who may have missed it in the sticky above, we have open space in a cottage for someone to join us... at Perfect Vue. HH

Well looks like Bassmaster had to cancell..  I will have room on board for (1) hardcore fisherperson   got too keep up with the charter boat leaving out of D dock   (hopefully they won't cut the rope till we get on station)  If anyone has room to bunk please ping me.. Sorry Headhunter I was at your cabin last year   unfortuantly I am a non-smoker
Lex, the smoke only bothers you for the first couple of days, after that, you are pretty much accustomed to it! Let us know if you change your mind, you are welcome. HH
~~~~Dam love to be down there guys, but boat's in dry dock, starter gone phooy, Any one leaving from Ajax got room in their boat and a space for a cot to set up.

OK, so we got memart and joey and Paul and Wayne and dano and Roy and percher and lexx and bmmike and JP and MtP and Lloyd and Terry, BrianK, cranksbait, Slowpoke, HH, Gerritt, BitSmit.  And Buster.  And me, and Solo mebbe, could be Carp too.  Bunk might do a cameo.  CCMT and Bly are also possibilities.  There must be a few more.  But we gots no GCD or APlumma or also DaPlumma.  None.  This will be another celebration of the cycle of the seasons, diminished by our absent friends.  But never mind that, can we get a roll call?  Please post to this, saying where your group is and who you is.   If you need help with the rent or boat gas and have some space, make a note of that too.  I think we meet for a meal on Saturday night, at Shoeless Joe's, see ya there.
I am there with my three, Friday night - Sat eve. We are staying at Perfect Vue

Yup my girlfriend and I will be at the Perfect Vue resort with Buster.  There should still be room on a couch or floor if someone needs a place to crash.  Can someone tell me where the boat launches are close to the view?  Thanks

DouG,....... myself ,GlennK,Memart and Slowpoke are staying at the Sportsman Motel we decided to cancel Perfectvue as we could not fill the 8 man overpriced cottage.  I guess we can just walk over to Merlands to enjoy the fire.Where is the restaurant you are going for supper at?  13 more sleeps to go.  MTP
And Percher! (90%)
Merlands... people is staying there??  Dano, Terry, Lloyd and I will be in a motel in Deseronto. Can't remember the name... and lost the free pen ! lol
wasn't it the twin peaks or twin towers or twin girls....I know the price was good
Yep an outragious $30 each per night...
Paul, Roy and I will be at Merlands, JP will be bunking with us I believe aswell.
Hey Joey when are you and Paul arriving to the BOQ?
We're arriving the Thursday Mike!
I will be there with the Motley Crew... Staying @ PerfectVu
Well i guess you got the list up Wayne. if anyone wants to know fishing was good this weekend.
Yes lets hear the details Lloyd.
I heard that it's the coziest of accomodations on the BOQ!!!     I heard that only LOSERS stay there!!!
WELL WATCH FOR A POST FROM TWO VERY HAPPY GUYS LOL BEST WALLEYE FISHING THEY EVER HAD. TWO BAD THE OTHER GUYS THEY HAD COMING DID NOT END UP GOING WE COULD HAVE HAD MORE LINES AND MORE FISH.

I CAN SAY SAT WAS SLOWER AND VERY HARD TO FISH WITH THAT WIND BUT WE DID STAY ON THE WATER AND GET FISH FROM 7 TO 1:30 AND WHEN A WAVE CAME OVER MY FRONT AND UP ONTO THE WINDSHIELD IT WAS TIME TO GO HOME LOL REMEMBER MY BOAT IS 23' SO YOU CAN FIGURE OUT HOW ROUGH IT WAS AT THE END. LOOKING FORWARD TO OUR OFC WEEKEND.
... do you not have a bilge pump???... fish on DUDE!!!

lol i have 2 of them. my boat never takes water when the nose stuffs a wave but hard to troll forward when the wave sends you backwards lol it was fun to say the least. best speed home in the waves was about 10 mph at 3200 rpm. 3200 rpm on a flat day is 25 mph lol hope we have a great 3 days of weather for our OFC fish fest
Hate to break it to you guys and girls.  Mel and I will not be able to attend.  More important things need to be taken care of.  Have fun and play safe.
Me and Bassmaster will be at the http://pec.on.ca/pictonharbourinn/  We were booked at the vu, but wanted to be closer to picton.

I'll be there this coming weekend, and will try not to sting too many fish before you guys get up there on the following weekend  Who knows, a repeat trip is a possibility, although there are other species and bodies of water calling.  Tony
Looks like lots pulling out of the veiw. well no dock no fire pit hmmmmmm to bad they could have had a full house.

Gonna be hard to visit I guess. Joe and the lads are still there... I have my full face air mask ready !  Lex is at the Picton Inn... so we may have to visit there.. go for supper.. visit the view.. etc.  Lex any word on my cradle hand off from John? Lloyd keeps his boat at the Tip dock. Hoping we don't visit with each other on the ramp in last years Sunday fashion....
